name: BSO
comment:
>>981162
>>981167

> [[ UI Messenger – Crimson Guardian Liza ]]
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Were you planning on departing now?
> [[ Crimson Guardian Liza ]]: Negative. We still have some matters to take care of here before we’ve the luxury of such an excursion.
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Can you plan on departing now?
> [[ Crimson Guardian Liza ]]: Why?
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Well, we’re sort of trapped at the bottom of Tethiss’s Claw.
> [[ Crimson Guardian Liza ]]: You went down through the Araneids’ nest?
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Split decision.
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Wild ride!
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Anyway, our resources are mostly depleted and we’re not in good shape.
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: I was hoping for an assist?
> [[ Crimson Guardian Liza ]]: I’ll send Candrence’s team down and have them clear you a path.
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Can you not do that instead? Freya is with us and I’d rather we not get into anything.
> [[ Crimson Guardian Liza ]]: I can think of an acceptable outcome to that situation.
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Liza.
> [[ Crimson Guardian Liza ]]: Fine.
> [[ Crimson Guardian Liza ]]: Kengo’s group is free as of a few moments ago. I’ll assign them to the task. Forwarding them your location shortly.
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: That’s better I guess.
> [[ Crimson Guardian Liza ]]: It better be, cause it’s about all I’ve got.

“What’s up, Scrapbook?” Crow asks.

“I’m talking to Liza now. The situation up top seems to be settling down, so we can afford to take our time.” You respond. “She’s sending a team down to carve us a route through Tethiss’s Claw.”

There’s a chill on the back of your neck. Your Artifact is ready for use.

“Fine by me.” Crow says, sitting on a stone ledge nearby and producing his UI holo-screen. “But fuck if I’m gonna talk about my feelings or something.”

Looks like you’re gonna be down here for a while.

> Give Aelriss a Celestial Gem.
> Search for something on the message boards. (Write-in.)
> Message someone.
> Write-in.
